Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Astartes Bike
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
In Warhammer 40,000, the Astartes Bike is a swift, heavily armored assault vehicle armed with advanced weaponry. It excels at hit-and-run tactics and plays key roles in rapid deployments, flanking maneuvers, and disrupting enemy formations. Each bike bears chapter-specific iconography, representing its Space Marine chapter's identity. It symbolizes advanced technology, strategic agility, and the indomitable will of the Space Marines in the grim universe of Warhammer 40,000. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1 
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
